import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import './spiritDataActions.css' const Login = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ email:'', password:'' }) const navigate =useNavigate() const [error, setError] = useState('') const handleChange = ({ currentTarget: input}) => { setData({ ...data, [input.name]: input.value}) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { const url = 'http://localhost:8000/api/login' const { data: res } = await axios.post(url, data) localStorage.setItem('isAuthenticated', JSON.stringify(res.message)) navigate('/admin/department') window.location.reload(false) } catch (error) { if ( error.response && error.response.status >= 400 && error.response.status <= 500 ) { setError(error.response.data.message); setTimeout(() => {setError('')}, 3000) } } } return (

) } export default Login
